channel.title: Breakfast on John L. Godlee
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on John L. Godlee

item.title: Chilaquiles
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 avocado, sliced
  • 6 eggs
  • 0.5 cup crumbled feta
  • 1.5 cup tortilla chips
  • 2.5 cups tomato salsa
  • 1 lime
  • 3 sprigs cilantro
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

Method

  1. heat oil in pan
  2. Add salsa to pan and simmer for 10 minutes
  3. Add chips, and stir into salsa
  4. Add feta
  5. Crack eggs around edge of pan
  6. Cover pan and let sit for 10 minutes or until eggs have set
  7. Serve with a spatula, with lime juice, extra feta, avocado, coriander

item.title: Freezer vegan breakfast burritos
item.description:
Ingredients

  • Tortillas
  • Green lentils, boiled and fry fried
  • Refried beans
  • Mushrooms
  • Bell peppers
  • Vegan cheese, shredded
  • Spinach/lettuce
  • Eggs
  • Coriander
  • Salt
  • Paprika
  • Paper towels

Method

  1. In large pan, fry off peppers, mushrooms
  2. Add green lentils
  3. Whisk eggs and add to pan, combine
  4. Combine with rest of ingredients on tortilla
  5. Roll up and wrap in paper towel and freeze for up to a month

item.title: Porridge
item.description:
To make one serving.

Ingredients

  • 50 g porridge oats
  • 20 g milk powder
  • 200 ml water

Method

  1. In a saucepan, mix oats and milk powder
  2. Add water and mix thoroughly
  3. Heat to boiling, then reduce heat and simmer, stirring to avoid oats sticking to bottom of pan
  4. Serve with:
    • Peanut butter
    • Raisins
    • Honey
    • Muesli
    • Nuts
    • Cocoa powder
    • CInnamon and brown sugar
